The building blocks are the same across all forms of life on Earth

About

This is a basic Jekyll theme based on Bootstrap 5. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com

You can find the source code for jekyll-bootstrap-theme at GitHub: jonaharagon / jekyll-bootstrap-theme

You can find the source code for Jekyll at GitHub: jekyll / jekyll
